column4: when I find a ppa like this: https://launchpad.net/~arand/+archive/ppa - how do I install it?

you have the very instructions there, no..? "You can update your system with unsupported packages from this untrusted PPA by adding ppa:arand/ppa to your system's Software Sources. (Read about installing) "
ah, I found the add-apt-repository command
